package_info.mp_subtitle: Twig as an alternative templating engine in Melis CMS pages.
package_info.mp_description:
Extends Twig's functionalities to offer an alternative rendering strategy inside Melis Platform.


Melis CMS Twig offers the following features & more:

- Twig's functionalities
- Melis Plugins & View Helpers
- Laminas Framework's View Helpers
Checkout the Basic usage guide or install the demo site (Melis Demo CMS Twig) from the Marketplace.
